article.headline: News and analysis for those planning for or living in retirement
article.body: From MarketWatch: The COLA increase for next year doesn’t look good: The cost of living adjustment helps Americans and their Social Security benefits beat inflation. The last few years, however, it has not been very helpful. Kevin O’Leary says investing $100 a week will make you a millionaire by retirement: The Shark Tank host said most Americans can find something to cut in their spending. Best...
